title: Organizer develops parent leaders for school board testimony
description: Organizer develops parent leaders for school board testimony
content:
Scenario: Organizer develops parent leaders for school board testimony
    Given a Spanish-speaking parent has never attended school board meeting
    And they want to advocate for dual-language program expansion
    When the organizer supports their leadership development via Observer
    Then the parent receives accessible data on dual-language outcomes
    And gets testimony template in Spanish they can personalize
    And practices with common questions board members might ask
    And sees other parents' successful testimony examples
    And becomes powerful education advocate speaking from lived experience
